summary:
## Mossad: Israel's Intelligence Agency

Mossad is Israel's national intelligence agency. It gathers information, carries out secret operations, and fights terrorism. The Prime Minister oversees it directly. With an estimated budget of $2.73 billion and 7,000 employees, it's one of the world's largest spy agencies. Mossad is rumored to have been involved in many assassinations. It works alongside other Israeli intelligence groups like Aman (military intelligence) and Shin Bet (internal security).
title: Mossad
